alert.note: Alert for East Carteret; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 6:55AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Craven and southwestern Carteret Counties through 730 AM EDT... At 655 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wildwood, or over Morehead City, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morehead City, Newport, Harlowe, Wildwood, North Harlowe, Michael J Smith Airport, Crab Point Village and Mitchell Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: East Carteret; Southern Craven; West Carteret
